name: optigrow-outsourcing-website
description: Corporate website for OptiGROW Outsourcing Private Limited - Payroll Outsourcing Specialists

scripts.start:
npm run dev && echo.
 && echo 'Server is running at:' && echo '  http://localhost:8000' && echo.
 && echo 'Access via local IP:' && for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %a in ('ipconfig ^| findstr /i "IPv4"') do echo '  http://%a:8000'

author: OptiGROW Outsourcing Private Limited
